com.vaadin.polymer.vaadin

Interface Column


  • @JsType
public interface Column

    Object for controlling and accessing the columns in the grid.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SRC 
      static String TAG 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getFlex()
      Flex ratio of the column (expand ratio in Vaadin-speak).
      String getHeaderContent()
      Content of the column in the default header row object.
      boolean getHidable()
      Set whether it is possible for the user to hide this column or not.
      boolean getHidden()
      Hides or shows the column.
      String getHidingToggleText()
      Sets the hiding toggle’s caption for this column.
      double getMaxWidth()
      Maximum width of the column in pixels.
      double getMinWidth()
      Minimum width of the column in pixels.
      String getName()
      Name of the column.
      Must be a valid JS variable name so that the same name can be used in
      the data source object fields.
      Function getRenderer()
      Custom renderer function for the columns data items.
      boolean getSortable()
      Enables sorting the data in the column by the end user.
      double getWidth()
      Width of the column in pixels.
      void setFlex(double value)
      Flex ratio of the column (expand ratio in Vaadin-speak).
      void setHeaderContent(String value)
      Content of the column in the default header row object.
      void setHidable(boolean value)
      Set whether it is possible for the user to hide this column or not.
      void setHidden(boolean value)
      Hides or shows the column.
      void setHidingToggleText(String value)
      Sets the hiding toggle’s caption for this column.
      void setMaxWidth(double value)
      Maximum width of the column in pixels.
      void setMinWidth(double value)
      Minimum width of the column in pixels.
      void setName(String value)
      Name of the column.
      Must be a valid JS variable name so that the same name can be used in
      the data source object fields.
      void setRenderer(Function value)
      Custom renderer function for the columns data items.
      void setSortable(boolean value)
      Enables sorting the data in the column by the end user.
      void setWidth(double value)
      Width of the column in pixels.

      • getHidable

        @JsProperty
boolean getHidable()

        Set whether it is possible for the user to hide this column or not.

        Attribute: hidable

        JavaScript Info:

      • setHidable

        @JsProperty
void setHidable(boolean value)

        Set whether it is possible for the user to hide this column or not.

        Attribute: hidable

        JavaScript Info:

      • getHidden

        @JsProperty
boolean getHidden()

        Hides or shows the column. By default columns are visible before
        explicitly hiding them.

        Attribute: hidden

        JavaScript Info:

      • setHidden

        @JsProperty
void setHidden(boolean value)

        Hides or shows the column. By default columns are visible before
        explicitly hiding them.

        Attribute: hidden

        JavaScript Info:

      • getSortable

        @JsProperty
boolean getSortable()

        Enables sorting the data in the column by the end user.

        Attribute: sortable

        JavaScript Info:

      • setSortable

        @JsProperty
void setSortable(boolean value)

        Enables sorting the data in the column by the end user.

        Attribute: sortable

        JavaScript Info:

      • getRenderer

        @JsProperty
Function getRenderer()

        Custom renderer function for the columns data items.

        Example:

         column.renderer = function(cell) {
      cell.element.innerHTML = '$' + cell.data;
  };
        JavaScript Info:

      • setRenderer

        @JsProperty
void setRenderer(Function value)

        Custom renderer function for the columns data items.

        Example:

         column.renderer = function(cell) {
      cell.element.innerHTML = '$' + cell.data;
  };
        JavaScript Info:

      • getFlex

        @JsProperty
double getFlex()

        Flex ratio of the column (expand ratio in Vaadin-speak). Uses integers.

        Attribute: flex

        JavaScript Info:

      • setFlex

        @JsProperty
void setFlex(double value)

        Flex ratio of the column (expand ratio in Vaadin-speak). Uses integers.

        Attribute: flex

        JavaScript Info:

double getMinWidth()

        Attribute: min-width

void setMinWidth(double value)

        Minimum width of the column in pixels.

        Attribute: min-width

      • getWidth

        @JsProperty
double getWidth()

        Width of the column in pixels.

        Attribute: width

        JavaScript Info:

      • setWidth

        @JsProperty
void setWidth(double value)

        Width of the column in pixels.

        Attribute: width

        JavaScript Info:

      • getName

        @JsProperty
String getName()

        Name of the column.
        Must be a valid JS variable name so that the same name can be used in
        the data source object fields.

        JavaScript Info:

      • setName

        @JsProperty
void setName(String value)

        Name of the column.
        Must be a valid JS variable name so that the same name can be used in
        the data source object fields.

        JavaScript Info:

      • getHeaderContent

        @JsProperty
String getHeaderContent()

        Content of the column in the default header row object.

        Attribute: header-text

        JavaScript Info:

      • setHeaderContent

        @JsProperty
void setHeaderContent(String value)

        Content of the column in the default header row object.

        Attribute: header-text

        JavaScript Info:

      • getHidingToggleText

        @JsProperty
String getHidingToggleText()

        Sets the hiding toggle’s caption for this column. Shown in the toggle
        for this column in the grid’s sidebar when the column is hidable.

        Attribute: hiding-toggle-text

        JavaScript Info:

      • setHidingToggleText

        @JsProperty
void setHidingToggleText(String value)

        Sets the hiding toggle’s caption for this column. Shown in the toggle
        for this column in the grid’s sidebar when the column is hidable.

        Attribute: hiding-toggle-text

        JavaScript Info:
